name: scitran-nifti-montage
label: SciTran: NIfTI Montage Generation Tool
description: NIfTI-Montage uses SciTran's data library (https://github.com/scitran/data) to generate a Montage from a NIfTI file.
author: SciTran Team

voxel_order.description: str [default 'LPS'] Three character string indicating the voxel order.

tile_size.description: int [default 256] Tilesize for generated zip or directory pyramid. Has no affect on montage_type 'png'.

montage_type.description: str [default 'zip'] Type of montage to create. can be 'zip', or 'png'.
